titleStmt.title: Formerly of Coleman-street. At the Hospital Gate in Smithfield, next door to the coffeehouse, liveth a doctor of physick; who, first in astrology, resolveth all lawful questions belonging to the body or estate of man; ...
titleStmt.author: Crawford, Henry, fl. 1676-1677.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
